description:
With newfound allies won in the battle at Dressrosa, and as the Navy watches, Luffy and the Straw Hats depart Dressrosa for open water. But will Luffy accept the oath of allegiance given by his new fleet?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il giuramento - La grande flotta di Cappello di Paglia!
Kobun no Sakazuki: Kessei! Mugiwara Daisendan!
La coupe de sake des partisans. Formation ! La grande flotte des Mugiwara !
Sakeschalen der Gefolgschaft! – Die Entstehung der Strohhut-Großflotte!
Sons` Cups! The Straw Hat Fleet Is Formed!
¡Los hijos beben sake! ¡La gran flota de Sombrero de Paja!
Отцы и дети! Формирование флота Мугивары!
أكواب الأبناء! تشكّل أسطول قبّعة القشّ!
子分の盃 結成! 麦わら大船団!
